## Description
Using reinforced fiberglass wrapped in aluminum sheeting to make antenna.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Type:|Manufacture|
|Skill Level:|2|
|Tech Level:|2|
|Process Time:|50.0 millisols|
|Tooling:|Soldering|
|Work Level:|100.0 millisols|
|Power Required:|0.3 kW/hr|
